Author: stevemurkle
Text: my snap reaction is to say your friend is a huge fucking tool, which may be the case, but i also remember my friends in high school telling me similar things because they knew how anxious i was about eating out and wanted to help me feel better even though it wasnâ€™t necessarily better for my overall head space. either way, try to give yourself some grace and not take it personally. the ED loves to turn everything into an attack on your body
